title: Bangladesh Electricity Production
description: Electricity Production in Bangladesh increased to 8245 Gigawatt-hour in July from 7640 Gigawatt-hour in June of 2022. Electricity Production in Bangladesh averaged 4999.88 Gigawatt-hour from 2013 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 8358 Gigawatt-hour in April of 2022 and a record low of 2457 Gigawatt-hour in January of 2013. This page provides - Bangladesh Electricity Production- actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Bangladesh Bureau of Statistics (BBS)
